00017 #include <mcMd/potentials/external/ExternalPotential.h>
00018 #include <mcMd/potentials/external/ExternalPotentialImpl.h>

00020 // Interaction classes
00021 #include <inter/external/BoxExternal.h>
00022 #include <inter/external/OrthoBoxExternal.h>
00023 #include <inter/external/SlitExternal.h>
00024 #include <inter/external/TanhCosineExternal.h>

00026 namespace McMd
00027 {
00028 
00029    using namespace Inter;
00030 
00034    ExternalFactory::ExternalFactory(System& system)
00035     : systemPtr_(&system)
00036    {}
00037 
00038    /*
00039    * Return a pointer to a new ExternalPotential, if possible.
00040    */
00041    ExternalPotential* ExternalFactory::factory(const std::string& name) const
00042    {
00043       ExternalPotential* ptr = 0;
00044 
00045       ptr = trySubfactories(name);
00046       if (ptr) return ptr;
00047 
00048       if (name == "BoxExternal") {
00049          ptr = new ExternalPotentialImpl<BoxExternal>(*systemPtr_);
00050       } else
00051       if (name == "OrthoBoxExternal") {
00052          ptr = new ExternalPotentialImpl<OrthoBoxExternal>(*systemPtr_);
00053       } else
00054       if (name == "SlitExternal") {
00055          ptr = new ExternalPotentialImpl<SlitExternal>(*systemPtr_);
00056       } else
00057       if (name == "TanhCosineExternal") {
00058          ptr = new ExternalPotentialImpl<TanhCosineExternal>(*systemPtr_);
00059       }
00060       return ptr;
00061    }
00062 
00063 }
00064 #endif
00065 #endif
